Package commandLineApp

Class FarmLandActionsManager

java.lang.Object
commandLineApp.FarmLandActionsManager
public class FarmLandActionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class manages the game logic of the Farm Land actions in the farm simulator.
Author:
Hayley Krippner, Michelle Muchemwa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FarmLandActionsManager​(GameManager gameManager, FarmManager farmManager)
    This method manages the Farm Land actions menu, its associated methods and executes the desired actions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askLandToClean()
    This method asks which Land action the user would like to perform.
    void askUseTractor()
    This method asks the user if they want to use a Tractor on their chosen plot of land.
    void askWhichAnimalLandPlot()
    The method asks the user which plot of Animal land they would like to clean and then cleans chosen land.
    void askWhichCropLandPlot()
    The method asks the user which plot of Crop land they would like to clean and then cleans chosen land.
    java.lang.Boolean checkHasTractor()
    This method checks if there is a Tractor in the user's Inventory.
    void displayLandCleaningMenu()
    This method displays the Land cleaning action options.
    void executeCleanLand()
    This method excutes the chosen Land cleaning menu option.
    void executeUseTractor()
    This method uses the Tractor on the selected LandPlot.
    void farmAnimalLandActionOptionControl()
    This method controls which Animal land action option is executed.
    void farmCropLandActionOptionControl()
    This method controls which Crop land action option is executed.
    int findTractorIndex()
    This method finds the index of the Tractor in the Inventory array.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • FarmLandActionsManager

      public FarmLandActionsManager​(GameManager gameManager, FarmManager farmManager)
      This method manages the Farm Land actions menu, its associated methods and executes the desired actions.
      Parameters:
      gameManager - The central game controller.
      farmManager - This manages the Farm menu.

  • Method Details

    • displayLandCleaningMenu

      public void displayLandCleaningMenu()
      This method displays the Land cleaning action options.

    • askLandToClean

      public void askLandToClean()
      This method asks which Land action the user would like to perform. This input is validated.

    • askUseTractor

      public void askUseTractor()
      This method asks the user if they want to use a Tractor on their chosen plot of land. This input is validated.

    • executeUseTractor

      public void executeUseTractor()
      This method uses the Tractor on the selected LandPlot.

    • checkHasTractor

      public java.lang.Boolean checkHasTractor()
      This method checks if there is a Tractor in the user's Inventory.
      Returns:
      hasTractor Whether to use owns a Tractor.

    • findTractorIndex

      public int findTractorIndex()
      This method finds the index of the Tractor in the Inventory array.
      Returns:
      tractorIndex The index of the Tractor.

    • executeCleanLand

      public void executeCleanLand()
      This method excutes the chosen Land cleaning menu option.

    • askWhichAnimalLandPlot

      public void askWhichAnimalLandPlot()
      The method asks the user which plot of Animal land they would like to clean and then cleans chosen land. The user may choose to cancle the option of cleaning Animal Land.

    • farmAnimalLandActionOptionControl

      public void farmAnimalLandActionOptionControl()
      This method controls which Animal land action option is executed.

    • askWhichCropLandPlot

      public void askWhichCropLandPlot()
      The method asks the user which plot of Crop land they would like to clean and then cleans chosen land. The user may choose to cancle the option of cleaning Crop Land.

    • farmCropLandActionOptionControl

      public void farmCropLandActionOptionControl()
      This method controls which Crop land action option is executed.
